revised_title: The Dual Force of the Dividing Cell: Part I - The Achromatic Spindle Figure Illustrated by Magnetic Chains of Force
tldr: The author investigates the dual force of the dividing cell, focusing on the achromatic spindle figure and its relation to magnetic chains of force. The study explores the role of centrosomes, spindle fibers, and the behavior of chromosomes during cell division, suggesting that cell force is of a 'dual' character similar to electrostatic force or magnetism.
